extendedInfo.description: Moobo Music PlayerMoobo Music Player - beautiful and powerful music player for Android! The music player is one of your essential software .Moobo Music Player features a beautiful, fast and intuitive interface, alongside powerful audio configuration options. In addition, support cloud service, and download free music from cloud. There more than 18 kinds of skins, and 3 desk widgets to choice.Key features:â¢ Popular format playbackListen to music in popular formats: MP3, MP2, MP1, OGG, WAV, AIFF, MIDI, AAC, AAC+, 3GP, XM, IT, S3M, MOD, MTM, UMX, MO3, MP4, M4A, OTAâ¢ Cloud music service (only for mp3)There are millions of songs on the cloud , you can track keyword search, you can listen, you can free download.â¢ Unique playlist systemYou can select songs in 5 categories: files, songs, albums, artists and favorite. Add them all to favorite categories just in one touch. There are no borders between folders and media library anymore.â¢ Lyric supportAutomatic scanning device lyrics file , matching the most appropriate lyrics file .In the playback interface scrolling display lyrics .â¢ Gorgeous designHas more than 18 kinds of background skins you can choose to make your music player unique.â¢ Ability to edit the songsYou do not have to worry about some of the songs without album name or artist name, can edit song information by yourself.â¢ Gorgeous Homescreen widgetsListen to music from your mobile desktop. You can choose on of three homescreen widgets: 4x1, 4x2, 2x2. Change widget colors depending your homescreen wallpapers!â¢ Support notification bar controlNotification bar drop-down list to display the playback of the song , and you can control playback.â¢ Change song by shakingSloshing around will play next song , rocking back and forth will play previous song.â¢ Headset supportSupport one button and multiple buttons headsets. Leave your device in the pocket!â¢ Local searchSearch Local music very easy.â¢ Sleep timerDonât worry about sleeping when Music Player on. Itâs turn off automatically by sleep timer.â¢ Support Android 2.2+Moobo Music Player - is a music player tablets and for budgets phones.We're working to make a best music player for users, and we can do it better with your suggestions and opinions.So if you have any questions or good advices,please feel free to contact us by sending email to wsy.wyu@gmail.comTags:VPlayer, Rockplayer, Mobo, MoboPlayer, Mobo Player,Mobo Video Player,MX Video Player,QQPlayer, Media Player, Streaming Player, Stream, Streaming, DLNA, MPlayer, music, MP3, musicplayer, player, song, download, music download, sound,audio, skin, picture, voice, lyrics, art, singer, hifi
